TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ViewTechnology extends System.Enum

summary.span: 定义设计器宿主所支持的技术集的标识符。

span.span: Defines identifiers for a set of technologies that designer hosts support.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将替换视图适配器模型，并添加了功能功能; 但是，功能保留向后兼容性和将来使用，如果您选择。The view adapter model replaces and adds functionality to the feature; however, the feature is retained for both backward compatibility and future use, if you choose. 定义指示要用于控制设计器承载的文档的显示模式标识符。 defines identifiers that can indicate the mode to use for controlling the display of a designer-hosted document. 仅应在设计器的托管环境中使用的默认值。You should only use the Default value in your designer hosting environment. 在旧版[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]，则枚举指定的 UI 模型根设计器支持的类型。In previous versions of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)], the enumeration specified the type of UI model supported by a root designer. 由于此模型不是可扩展的则应改用*视图适配器*模型。Because this model is not extensible, you should instead use a *view adapter* model. 视图适配器是适应到另一种类型的对象的类型。A view adapter is a type that adapts an object of one type to another. 例如，HTML 设计器可能会返回`DemoDOM`树作为其视图。For example, an HTML designer might return a `DemoDOM` tree as its view. HTML 设计器返回默认视图的技术。The HTML designer returns a view technology of Default. Windows 窗体宿主环境将具有一个或多个可用的视图适配器类。A Windows Forms hosting environment would have one or more view adapter classes available. 如果一个这样的类可以转换`DemoDOM`到 Windows 窗体控件，宿主应用程序可以支持此类型的设计器。If one such class could convert the `DemoDOM` into a Windows Forms control, the hosting application can support this type of designer. 如果没有适配器可以处理从设计器的返回的数据类型方法，在设计器的负载将失败，并且用户将看到错误。If no adapter can handle the data type returned from the designer's method, the load of the designer will fail, and the user will be presented with an error. Visual Studio 具有可扩展方案用于提供视图适配器，因此它可以适应任何 UI 技术。Visual Studio has an extensible scheme for providing view adapters, so it can adapt to any UI technology. 第三方技术提供商还可以提供适当的视图适配器，马上就可以使用其对象模型。Third-party technology providers can also offer an appropriate view adapter, and their object models are immediately consumable. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用`ViewTechnology.Default`在设计器中。The following example demonstrates how to use `ViewTechnology.Default` in a designer. 此示例摘自一个更大的示例为提供接口。This example is part of a larger example provided for the interface. [!code-cpp[IRootDesigner Sample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IRootDesigner Sample/CPP/class1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IRootDesigner Sample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IRootDesigner Sample/CS/class1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IRootDesigner Sample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IRootDesigner Sample/VB/class1.vb#1)] 下面的示例演示如何使用视图 > 枚举在设计器中。The following example demonstrates how to use the \`ViewTechnology> enumeration in a designer. 此示例摘自一个更大的示例为提供类。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[LocalizationExtenderProviderExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/LocalizationExtenderProviderExample/CPP/class1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[LocalizationExtenderProviderExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/LocalizationExtenderProviderExample/CS/class1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[LocalizationExtenderProviderExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/LocalizationExtenderProviderExample/VB/class1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ComponentModel.Design.ViewTechnology Default = int32(2)

summary.span: 指定默认的视图技术支持。

span.span: Specifies the default view technology support.

summary.span: 根设计器可以返回任何类型的对象，但该对象必须与用于宿主技术的适配器兼容。

span.span: The root designer may return any type of object, but the object must be compatible with an adapter for the technology of the host.

summary.span: 诸如 Visual Studio 之类的托管环境提供了一种插入新视图技术适配器的方法。

span.span: Hosting environments such as Visual Studio provide a way to plug in new view technology adapters.

summary.span: Windows 窗体设计器的默认视图对象是 实例。

span.span: The default view object for the Windows Forms designer is a instance.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ComponentModel.Design.ViewTechnology Passthrough = int32(0)

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This value has been deprecated. Use ViewTechnology.Default instead. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=14202")
System.Obsolete("This value has been deprecated. Use ViewTechnology.Default instead. https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=14202")

summary.span: 表示将视图对象直接传递给开发环境的模式。

span.span: Represents a mode in which the view object is passed directly to the development environment.

summary.span: 视图对象必须实现开发环境所需的任何接口。

span.span: The view object must implement any interfaces the development environment requires.

summary.span: Visual Studio 开发环境支持以下视图对象：ActiveX 控件、活动文档，或实现 `IVsWindowPane` 接口的对象，该接口通过 Visual Studio VSI（Visual Studio 集成）程序提供。

span.span: The Visual Studio development environment supports view objects that are either an ActiveX control, active document, or an object that implements the `IVsWindowPane` interface that is available through the Visual Studio VSI (Visual Studio Integration) program.

summary.span: Visual Studio 开发环境为此视图技术提供支持。

span.span: The Visual Studio development environment provides support for this view technology.

summary.span: 并非所有开发环境都支持此视图技术。

span.span: Support for this view technology is not necessarily available in all development environments.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ComponentModel.Design.ViewTechnology WindowsForms = int32(1)

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This value has been deprecated. Use ViewTechnology.Default instead. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=14202")
System.Obsolete("This value has been deprecated. Use ViewTechnology.Default instead. https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=14202")

summary.span: 表示由 Windows 窗体控件对象为根设计器提供显示的模式。

span.span: Represents a mode in which a Windows Forms control object provides the display for the root designer.

summary.span: 设计器宿主使用 Windows 窗体控件填充开发环境文档窗口。

span.span: The designer host fills the development environment document window with the Windows Forms control.
